# tinyNet
This python3 package helps to create shorturl.

## Installtion
```pip install tiny-net```


## How to use it?

```
import tinynet

url = 'http://sudhanshu.webrectifyers.in'

surl = tinynet.Link(url)

print(surl.show_url())
```
